hadiths.text: Abbad b. Tamim reported from his uncle that a person made a complaint to the Prophet (ﷺ) that he entertained (doubt) as if something had happened to him which had rendered his ablution invalid. He (the Prophet) said:He should not cease (to pray) unless he hears a sound or perceives a smell (of passing wind)

chapter.eng-name: A Person Who Is Unsure Of Breaking His Wudu'
